string-array.name: g_description
string-array.item: Alfred enjoys eatting bananas and talking long walks in the park. Sometimes he likes to climb trees.
Frank likes hanging out with his friends in his free time. He also paints when he has down time, usually pictures of bananas.
Steve is the lady killer. Always on the lookout for a new friend to hang around with.
Sigfried like to read books and write poetry. He can often be seen reciting Shakespear in the park on a nice summer day.
Martin is a large gorilla who you dont want to mess with. In his free time he likes to practice GMMA which is gorilla mixed martial arts.
Bill is smart and friendly gorilla. He enjoys long walks on the beach and eating bananas.
Buch is an angry gorilla. He often will get into fights with his friends when they discuss the best time to eat a banana.
Tiny has a ironic name. Not only is not tiny but is the largest of the bunch. Dont mess with Tiny.
Norman is the thinker of the bunch. When hes not swinging from the tree and can be found doing physics.
